content: training wheels a primer for the breakaway crochet method copyright 2017 lisa hounshell introduction congratulations you are about to open up a whole new world of crochet possibilities this breakaway crochet primer covers the core skills and concepts that are vitally necessary for working breakaway crochet projects it is important that you have a good understanding of what is presented here because this essential information is not necessarily going to be explained anywhere else to help you understand the basics the lessons that follow build one upon the next you will learn the core techniques how to use the core techniques to work a motif and how to work motifs in a continuous series the training wheels project is also included which will give you the opportunity to put into practice these new skills although the training wheels project is optional i highly recommend you do it because it will give you a good feel for what to expect in later projects there is a lot of information to digest but this is only because i m trying to explain something totally new for clarity i ve broken things down as much as possible and added in detailed commentary along the way in an effort to maximize the meaningfulness of each step however once you re past the initial learning curve you will see that everything it is much simpler than it first seems so take your time keep an open mind and practice the skills as you go it will be worth it with that said i know that some of you may be the impatient type and can t be stuffed reading about all the intricate details in regards to what is going on under the hood if this is the case then feel free to skip ahead if you want to however even though i agonised over every word of this primer and it would please me to no end if you thoughtfully reflected over each and every bit of it… the only section that you cannot skip no matter what is the floating ring lesson which gives instructions for the foundational technique that makes my ground-breaking method of crochet possible in other words if you do not learn how to make a floating ring then you will really be scratching your head if you try to work any of my breakaway crochet projects with that said time to get started the lessons are hands-on so grab a hook and some scrap yarn so that you can work through the examples as we go along 2 breaking from tradition as a way of getting us all on the same page we are going to be talking a lot about this very simple motif if you re crocheting along go ahead and make one note us terminology used throughout step 1 chain 4 slip_stitch into the first chain to form a ring step 2 chain 3 counts as the first double_crochet of the round step 3 15 double
